analysis.key_quote: This rule will not lead to career employee accountability, but has everything to do with the politicization of science in the HHS and NIH.
analysis.rationale: The comment strongly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about the politicization of science and the potential loss of expertise and integrity in federal agencies. It draws parallels to historical examples of scientific suppression, emphasizing the negative consequences of undermining merit-based systems and due process.
